_meta.note: Authoritative effect keys used by mechanics.

extra_rolls: Adds this many extra rerolls for the current encounter (unless a duration is specified).
crit_bonus: Adds directly to crit chance; e.g., 0.05 = +5% absolute.
damage_bonus: Flat damage added after dice combos and item bonuses.
gold_mult: Multiplies gold earned by (1 + value) for the given duration.
shop_discount: Reduces shop prices by this fraction; e.g., 0.10 = 10% off.
shield: Temporary HP consumed before normal HP.
cleanse: Removes all negative statuses currently on the player.
disarm_token: Stores one automatic pass for the next 'trap' hazard.
escape_token: Prevents one death; on lethal damage set HP to 1 and consume.
item: Grants an inventory item by name; see items_definitions.json.
status: Applies a named status (negative or positive); see statuses_catalog.json.
duration: Optional: 'combat', 'floor', or 'run' to set how long the temp effect lasts.
